title.rendered: The Dean’s List: If not an architect…

content.rendered:
Welcome to the Dean’s List: your weekly destination for Deborah Berke’s most on-topic, off the beaten path rankings.

P: Mad-cap inventor
7: Painter
6: Tap dancer
5: Wise sage
4: Glass blower
B: Chef
SB: Professional Baseball Player

Comments: “really didn’t like any of your options…” (EDITORS NOTE: our suggestions this week were entirely replaced by write-ins)
Also, special note next to “Early Retirement”: “NEVER”
